basic.description: This course discusses the modeling and analysis of material flow systems, flow-shop and job-shop scheduling, material handling system analysis, mathematical and simulation modeling for general manufacturing and industrial    systems.
basic.subject: ESI
basic.title: Modeling and Analysis of Manufacturing and Industrial Systems

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: EIN 4333, ESI 3312C, ESI 4523, ESI 5408, and ESI 5524.
